Package ma02_resources.project

Interface Task

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Comparable<Task>
    public interface Task
extends java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Comparable<Task>
    This interface represents a project task in the CBL.

    • Method Summary

      • addSubmission

        void addSubmission​(Submission submission)
        Add a submission to the task If the submission is null, throw an IllegalArgumentException. If the submissions array is full, expand it by a factor of 2.
        Parameters:
        submission - the submission to be added

      • extendDeadline

        void extendDeadline​(int days)
        Extend the deadline of the task by the given number of days. if the number of days is negative, throw an IllegalArgumentException.
        Parameters:
        days - the number of days to extend the deadline by.

      • equals

        boolean equals​(java.lang.Object obj)
        This is an implementation of the equals() method in Java that checks if two TaskImpl objects are equal based on their title attribute.
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Parameters:
        obj - The object to be compared with the current object.
        Returns:
        true if the two objects are equal, false otherwise.

      • compareTo

        int compareTo​(Task task)
        Compares two tasks by their start date.
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<Task>
        Parameters:
        task - the task to be compared with the current task
        Returns:
        a negative integer, zero, or a positive integer as this task is less than, equal to, or greater than the specified task.
